column2: library(tidyverse)  # This loads dplyr, tidyr, ggplot2, and other useful packages
# Set the clinically relevant non-inferiority margin for Harrell's C-statistic
# Sample data format (replace this with your actual data)
# Assuming `data` dataframe has columns: Population, Model, C_statistic, CI_Lower, CI_Upper
# data <- data.frame(Population = ..., Model = ..., C_statistic = ..., CI_Lower = ..., CI_Upper = ...)
# Pivot data to make MDRD the reference and calculate differences
pivot_wider(names_from = Model, values_from = c(C_statistic, CI_Lower, CI_Upper)) %>%
